titles.title: A bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2105 East Cook Street in Springfield, Illinois, as the "Colonel John H. Wilson, Jr. Post Office Building".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S389)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary:
1/14/2009--Introduced.
Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2105 East Cook Street in Springfield, Illinois, as the "Colonel John H. Wilson, Jr. Post Office Building."
